about_the_game:
Maze (The Amazing Labyrinth) is interesting puzzle game for everyone. Get ready to face different types of challenges in the game.

Features
-Amazing Maze Puzzle game for everyone.
-Players ability will be judged in various complex situations. Game will start with easy puzzle levels with complex levels at a later stage.
-50 Different Levels in the game. Players excitement increases after every level. (Demo Version gives access to 10 Levels. To play all 50 levels, upgrade to Full Version.)
-Many More.

Get Ready for Ultimate Brain Challenge

name: Maze (The Amazing Labyrinth) Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later required
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 515 7U
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Nvidia GTX 970 Graphic Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

publishers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
